segments.text: This drawing captures a typical kitchen, but with some twists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying dishes, oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration on the plate is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the overflowing sink spilling water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle that's getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, but she keeps on drying without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, I see the kids up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, palm open for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating so cutely in their secret snack time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is serene and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a scene of innocence and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
